error.networkError: [JA] Network error. Please check your connection.

validation.projectNameMax: [JA] Project name can’t be longer than 50 characters
validation.projectDescriptionMax: [JA] Description can’t be longer than 500 characters
validation.tagTooLong: [JA] Tags can’t be longer than 30 characters
validation.tagMax: [JA] You can add up to 10 tags in total
validation.tagDuplicate: [JA] This tag has already been added
validation.tooManyLongTags: [JA] You can only add up to 3 long tags (over 10 characters)
validation.routeInvalid: [JA] Route cannot start with a slash '/'
validation.routeTooLong: [JA] Route can’t be longer than 200 characters
validation.figmaUrlInvalid: [JA] Figma URL must be a valid Figma link with ?node-id parameter
validation.figmaTokenInvalid: [JA] Figma token must start with figd_ and contain only letters and numbers

helper.projectName: [JA] Choose a descriptive name for your project
helper.projectDescription: [JA] Provide additional context about your project goals
helper.tags: [JA] Add relevant tags to help organize and find your project
helper.path: [JA] URL path for your page (cannot start with a slash '/')
helper.figmaUrl: [JA] Paste the Figma file URL with node-id parameter
helper.figmaToken: [JA] Your personal Figma access token starting with figd_
helper.outDirPath: [JA] Directory where generated files will be saved
helper.assetsOutDir: [JA] Directory for exported assets and images
helper.assetsPrefixPath: [JA] URL prefix for asset references in generated code
helper.homePage: [JA] This will set the page as the homepage
